Expect delays in [A] and [C] train service.

Summary._: SIGNAL MAINTENANCE  [1] South Ferry-bound trains run express from 72 St to Chambers St

Description._: SIGNAL MAINTENANCE  [1] South Ferry-bound trains run express from 72 St to Chambers St

LongDescription: <b><i>SIGNAL MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[1] South Ferry-bound trains run express from 72 St to Chambers St</b>Late Nights, 9:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Jan 29 - Feb 2<br><br>Trains stop at Times Sq-42 St, 34 St-Penn Station and 14 St.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> <b>66</b>, <b>59</b> and <b>50 Sts</b>, take the <b>[1]</b> to Times Sq-42 St and transfer to an uptown <b>[1]</b> or <b>[2]</b> <i>local</i>.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> <b>28</b>, <b>23</b> and <b>18 Sts</b>, take the [1] to 14 St and transfer to an uptown <b>[1]</b> or <b>[2]</b> <i>local</i>.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> <b>Christopher</b>, <b>Houston</b>, <b>Canal</b> and <b>Franklin Sts</b>, take the [1] to Chambers St and <br>transfer to an uptown [1] or [2] <i>local</i>.<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [1] or [2] to 14 St, 34 St-Penn Station or 72 St and<br>transfer to a South Ferry-bound [1].<br><b><br>
